original: @138b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
analyzed: @138b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo // na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.🔽Homage to the Blessed Buddhas.

original: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
analyzed: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/

original: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni mah'a pa ti sa re h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni mah'a pa ti sa re h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ maṇidhari vajrī mahāpatisara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'di bzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By holding this, one will hold the noble queen of knowledge, the great protectress.

original: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī for holding the noble great protectress is complete.
